pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a street in a Japanese town on an overcast, rainy day. The foreground features a wide, wet sidewalk and a lush flowerbed filled with bright yellow and purple blossoms. Cars can be seen driving along the wet road. In the background, a large golf driving range with high netting is prominent, surrounded by houses, trees, and numerous overhead power lines.
